chat_history.message:
Hello, My product iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem: Hello everyone, no package has arrived so far, no status change in the tracking history, address checked and reported to UPS and confirmed by UPS, UPS is still expecting "Address information" to name the delivery date
Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has contacted UPS and requested delivery, as the delivery address is correct. However, there is no new delivery movement.

Can you please also check the delivery?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We will check with our logistics partner about this issue. We will update you soon.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

any news?

Regards,
Feyza from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We are still waiting for a response by our logistics partner. In the meantime, kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello,

The carrier tried to deliver yesterday but the firm was closed. They will deliver today.

Cordialement, Sincerely

Valérie DECAMPS
